choices: Emma came down to save you
Seeing them change in front of you
151211.content:
You walked down to the kitchen and dining room, continuing to scratch your chest in the process.

"Damn, what is wrong with my chest?" you asked in fustration. You were quite fustrated at the moment. You still had lingering effects from the stomach ache which supposedly shrank your waist. Now, your chest seemed to be acting up. You needed to take a look at this. Without another thought, you ran into the family room where no one was right now. Your mom was already at work.

After getting into the family room, you lifted up your shirt and you were surprised. It was almost like your skin was really irritated, like you had an allergy or something. Particularly, the rash was around your nipples and nowhere else.

"Sheesh, maybe I should get some allergy medicine or something" you muttered to yourself.

You walked back into the kitchen and got yourself some cereal as it was your usual meal. Andy was there too, enjoying his own breakfast. He looked up at you.

"Hay James, are you a little smaller?" he asked.

"Why would you think that?" you asked him.

"You just seem a lot thinner than usual" said Andy. He was quite observent for a 9-year old.

"Well, maybe I am" you replied. Andy didn't seem to find it overly odd. He did however find the necklace to be curious.

"It's kind of odd seeing you wear that necklace though" chuckled Andy.

"Be quiet" I sort of yelled at him, which just made him laugh. I quickly finished up my meal and got my backpack as usual. I would leave for the bus stop soon. However, as I went to my shoes, I find them to be much bigger than normal.

"Oh great, what now?" I asked out of fustration. It was bad enough with the stomach ache and irritating chest and all. Now, your own shoes didn't fit anymore.

Just then, what happened?
151211.title: Going Downstairs

1512111.content:
Emma came downstairs. "What's wrong, James?" she asked.

What's right? I thought, but didn't say. "All of a sudden, my shoes are too big for my feet."

"Hang on," she said, and ran back upstairs.

Two minutes later, she ran back downstairs, holding a pair of shoes. "Try these."

With nothing to lose, I did. My feet slid into these shoes as if they had been custom made for me. In no mood to ask questions, or even to examine the shoes, I just said, "Thanks," and left the house.

Halfway between my house and the bus stop, my hips erupted in pain. When the pain subsided, I could tell my hips had grown wider. "What is happening to me today? And why?"

I continued on my way, only to discover that the way I walked had acquired a distinct swivel. It's like I'm turning... I refused to complete the thought. That just doesn't happen. It doesn't!

I walked the rest of the way to the bus stop, got on the bus, and rode to school, ignoring the way my hips swayed. Then, at school, I ignored the stares I was getting.
1512111.title: Emma came down to save you

15121111.content:
The first couple of classes went by like normal: that is, nothing happened to me during those classes. Between second and third period, however, I had to go to the bathroom. I had held it in for as long as I could, but now my back teeth were floating. As I walked into the boys' room, I realized that the reason I hadn't gone before now was because I was scared of what I was going to find when I opened my pants.

Well, when I finally did, that stuff was just like it was before these weird things started happening, and I gave a bigger sigh of relief than usual. As I finished up and flushed, I said to myself, "Maybe it's finally stopped, and I can go back to normal." I zipped up my fly and went to wash my hands.

As I washed, I happened to glance at my reflection, and I froze.

My hair was growing.

In a matter of seconds, my hair went from short to shoulder-length, and all I could do was watch it happen.

When it stopped, I took a good look at my hands. I thought about all the things that had happened to me today. I looked at the shoes I was wearing, and finally recognized them as having been my older sister's.

"My God, I'm turning into a girl!"
15121111.title: A Surprise in the Bathroom

151211111.content:
"Why would you be turning into a girl?" asked Jesse, my best friend.

"I don't know what's causing it," I replied. "I just know that's what's happening to me."

"But... but people just don't change their sex like that, man."

"Look at me, dude: I've got a narrow waist, child-bearing hips, I'm wearing my sister's shoes, not to mention the fact that my hair wasn't this long before today."

Suddenly, Jesse's eyes went wide.

"What is it?"

"Nothing, it's nothing. Just... just don't go looking in the mirror."

Naturally, that was the first thing I went to do. In the mirror, I saw that I now had a girl's face. "Still want to tell me nothing's happening?"

"Okay, something's definitely happening. But what do we do about it?"

"I don't know. Maybe, when this thing has run its course, I'll change back." I grabbed my throat. On the last three words, my voice went higher.

"Freaky."

"You're telling me," I replied, my voice undeniably girlish.
151211111.title: The Changes Continue

1512111111.content:
By the time school let out, I had become the center of attention. The growth of my fingernails was just the icing on the cake. Once I got off the bus, I ran straight home.

When I got home, Andy and Emma were there already. "Whoa, James," Andy said, "you look a lot different."

"Don't bother me," I said, as I continued running, up the stairs and into my room. Closing the door behind me, I took off my shoes, collapsed onto my bed, and took a nap.

I dreamed that Jesse and I were playing a video game. When I won, Jesse said, "Congratulations," and kissed me. We kept on kissing, then we took our clothes off, then I lay back in bed as Jesse climbed on top of me, and we made love.

I woke up, still feeling my orgasm. I knew it was just a dream, but sitting up let me know that I had changed in my sleep. I got up and walked into the bathroom.

Closing and locking the bathroom door, I began taking off my clothes. Taking my shirt off, I saw my breasts. I turned this way and that, looking at their shape, wondering what size bra I needed now.

Taking off my pants and my underwear, I spread my legs and looked at my reflection. No doubt about it: I was now a girl.

That fact didn't fill me with terror, the way changing into a girl had all day. Now that I was completely a girl, I was okay with it.

Little hands knocked on the door, followed by a chorus of voices asking, "James, are you okay?" Two different questions, I thought.

Putting my shirt back on, since that was long enough to cover my naughty bits, I opened the door. "I'm okay, guys," I told them, "but, from now on, call me Julie."

"But Julie's a girl's name," Andy said.

"It is," I confirmed. "But I'm a girl now, so I should have a girl's name." Turning to Emma, I asked, "Are there any clothes where you found the shoes?"

"Uh-huh."

"Bring me some, would you, please? I need a top, jeans or a skirt, and some underthings. My boy clothes don't fit me anymore."

Emma left, then returned with a shirt and blue jeans. "No underthings," she said. "Sorry, Julie."

"It's not your fault, kiddo." I went back to my room to get dressed. The shirt was easy to get on, but I struggled to get the jeans on past my hips. I finally did it, though, and I exulted in my triumph.
1512111111.title: I Become Fully Female

15121111111.content:
Not long after I got into my new pants, I heard Mom pulling into the driveway. As far as she knew, I was still James. How would she react to finding that her son was now her daughter?

I could hear Andy and Emma calling Mom's name, even before she got into the house. Perhaps they were eager to tell her about the new me.

"Hello, kids," Mom said. "Where's James?"

"Julie's up in her room," Andy replied.

"Who's Julie? Does your brother have a girl in his room? He knows that's against the rules."

"James is Julie now, Mommy," Emma said. "The centaur turned him into a girl."

"I'm not in the mood to play, Emma," Mom said. "James! You'd better be alone in there, buster!"

With a sigh, I opened my door. "Hi, Mom."

"Who are you? And where is James? And where do you get off, calling me Mom? I've never even seen you before."

"It's true, Mom. I'm James, or I was. I'm Julie now."

"What are you talking about? Did James put you up to this?"

"Do you remember the time when I was little, and I decided to wrap a towel around my head, but I left myself naked?"

It was one of her favorite stories about me, partially because it embarrassed me so much. "There's no way James told you that story," Mom said.

"You're catching on, Mom."

"You... you really are James?"

"Please, Mom, call me Julie."

She sat on my bed. "How did this happen? How could it happen?"

"I don't know. All I know is, I've been changing, bit by bit, all day today. Emma has been a big help, finding things for me to wear. She couldn't do it all, though: I'm going commando here."

Mom pulled me in for a hug. "As long as you're okay, that's all that matters,... Julie. I guess I'll have to take you shopping."

******************************


That night, after I put on my favorite oversized T-shirt to use as a sleep shirt, Emma came into my room. "Can you paint my toenails?"

"Only if you paint mine."

So that's what we did. Emma didn't mind the mistakes I made, and I got a kick out of having purple toenails.

Mom came to the door. "I was wondering what all the giggling was about," she said. "Bedtime, young lady."

Emma got up and went to her room. "You're adjusting to this better than I would," Mom said to me.

I shrugged. "It just feels right, you know?"

"Goodnight, Julie."

"Goodnight, Mom."

I fell asleep, not knowing that the changes weren't done yet.
15121111111.title: Mom Meets the New Me

151211111111.content:
I awoke the next morning with a smile on my face. My first morning as a girl, I thought. Where will the day take me? I wiggled my toes, smiling at my cute little purple toenails, and got up and headed for the bathroom.

I didn't have the foggiest idea what girls did to get ready for the day, but perhaps inspiration would strike me. I walked into the bathroom, closed the door, and turned on the light.

And I wanted to scream.

My ears had changed.

Instead of the cute little ready-for-piercing ears I had last night, my ears this morning were long and pointed. In fact, the more I looked at them, the more they looked like a horse's ears. They weren't furry, and they were on the sides of my head and not the top, but they had the same shape as a horse's ears. "What is going on?"

Just then, I did scream, in agony, as something happened to my feet. This pain made changing into a girl feel like a relaxing massage.

When the pain subsided, I looked down at my feet, and screamed again.

I was standing on a pair of hooves.
151211111111.title: More Changes

1512111111111.content:
Mom followed my screams to the bathroom. "Julie? What is it, dear? Did you get your - " She stopped when she saw me. "What happened to you?"

"I don't know, Mom," I replied. "My ears were like this when I woke up. The hooves just happened."

"Are you in any pain?"

"Not right now. It's like when I was turning into a girl: the changing hurt, but, once whatever phase of the change was through, I felt normal again."

"I feel like I should be taking you to the doctor, Julie. But I don't think a doctor could actually help us. They couldn't explain why you became a girl, and they wouldn't have a chance at explaining this."

Just then, I was hit with another burst of pain, this time just above my backside. I also felt my scalp tingling.

When the pain subsided, I opened my eyes, and gasped at my reflection. My hair had grown dramatically longer, down to the small of my back.

Feeling where the pain had been, I found... a horse's tail, its hair hanging to the ground.

I looked up at Mom. "The ranch?"

She nodded. "The ranch."
1512111111111.title: Mom Sees

15121111111111.content:
I didn't know what was happening, but Mom and I agreed that, since I seemed to be developing horse characteristics, the ranch might be the best place for me, at least while this was happening.

Walking on two hooves wasn't easy, but, with Mom's help, I was able to get out of the car. However, Mom had to carry my bag herself. Only blouses and T-shirts were in the bag, because we hadn't had time to go bra shopping, and nothing we had for below the waist could accommodate my tail.

We went around back to check the stable, and we had just made it inside when the pain of change gripped me again. The pain was focused on my crotch this time, and I put both hands over it as Mom helped me down.

Finally, the pain subsided, and Mom and I looked at what was there now. It was a mass, split in two down the middle, with a row of bumps on either side. "What is it?" I asked.

"It looks like... an udder," Mom said.

"Do horses have udders?"

"Mares do." The times I had come to the ranch before, all we had were geldings, so I knew nothing about mare biology.

"This is so weird."

"My oldest son turned into my second-oldest daughter, and is now becoming a horse, and you've just now found the weird part?"

"Well, if I'm turning into a horse, and I have an udder, you'd think I wouldn't have breasts anymore. But I do." I unbuttoned my top and showed her. "They haven't even gone down."

"Julie, what are you saying?"

"I'm not sure what I'm turning into, Mom, but I don't think it's a horse."
15121111111111.title: The Ranch

151211111111111.content:
"I wanted to take you shopping," Mom said, "but, the way you're changing now, I had better go alone. I'll try to guess your size. The blouses should be easier." She paused. "Do you think you'll be alright on your own while I'm in town?"

I looked out the stable gate. "Give me a couple of those apples."

Mom got me the apples. "You still can't stand very well. What if you change again, and fall down?"

"I'll stay up as long as I can," I replied. "If I fall down, I'll have to lie there until you get back, that's all. I think... I think it won't be much longer. Whatever's happening to me, whatever's causing it, I feel like it's nearly finished. I'm where I need to be."

"Well, I'll be back just as soon as I can, Julie. Be careful." She kissed my cheek. I waved goodbye as she left.

As the sound of the car motor died away, the pain came back. My lower body felt like it was on fire. As I closed my eyes, I felt something push out of me. I held onto a post to remain upright.

As the pain died down, I moved my hand to feel what happened to me. Beneath the flare of my hips, I was covered in velvety fur.

Looking to the side as I opened my eyes, I saw that my legs looked like the hind legs of a horse.

Looking at my front, I saw a tiny pair of horse's legs, kicking at the air.

Now I knew what was happening to me, even if I still didn't know how or why: I was becoming a centaur.
151211111111111.title: My Next Change

1512111111111111.content:
Yesterday, I slowly turned into a girl. Today, I was becoming a centaur.

Then, I remembered: Didn't Emma say that she had asked a statue of a female centaur for help with the family's money problems? And that the centaur mare had promised to help? Was what was happening to me the statue's doing?

You might think that's an unlikely story, but I ask you: Is it more or less unlikely than a teenage boy turning into a centaur mare for any other reason?

While I thought, I ate the apples Mom gave me. Before this, I would have insisted on cutting the skin off of the apples. Now, though, I was hungry enough to eat the whole thing. And I mean the whole thing, core and all.

Suddenly, the changing pain hit me again, worse than ever before. It felt like my lower half was being pulled in a hundred different directions at once, while my insides shifted all over the place. I screamed for what seemed like hours, praying for the pain to stop, even if it meant my death.

The pain did end, eventually, and I took several deep breaths. Very deep breaths. It felt like my lungs could hold much more air than before.

I heard Mom's voice calling for me, and I opened my eyes and looked at myself. As I had guessed, I was now a centaur.

"Julie?" Mom said as she came into the stable. "How did you get so tall?"

"I've changed a lot, Mom. You'd better brace yourself."

Mom came to my stall and looked inside. "Oh, my."

Mom had worried about me falling over. Now, it was my turn to worry about her fainting. "Are you okay, Mom?"

"It's a bit of a shock," she replied. "What about you? Are you alright?"

"I think so. But, then, I don't have a frame of reference. What's healthy for a centaur?"
1512111111111111.title: The Change Becomes Complete

15121111111111111.content:
"I appreciate you coming on such short notice," I heard Mom saying.

"It's a slow day," replied a stranger, a woman who sounded close to Mom's age. "It might help if I knew what was the matter."

"I didn't know how to describe this," Mom said, the two of them drawing closer. "As you'll see."

The woman could see me now. Her eyes widened, and her jaw dropped. "Oh. Oh, my."

"Julie, this is Dr. O'Connor. She's a veterinarian. Doctor, this is my daughter, Julie. Until yesterday, she was my son, James."

"Hi," I said, giving a short wave.

"Well, uh, let's get started," Dr. O'Connor said. Turning to Mom, she said, "Perhaps you should give us some privacy."

As Mom left the stable, Dr. O'Connor said, "That's the first time I've ever had to say that to someone who called me in. All my previous patients needed someone else to do the talking." As she began her examination, she asked, "Your mother said you used to be a boy?"

I nodded. "Yesterday, I changed into a girl. And, today, this happened."

"How do you feel? Is there any pain, discomfort?"

"The pain was just when I was changing. Whenever a part of me changed, it hurt. I'm not changing anymore, so there's no pain. As for discomfort, well,... "

"What's wrong?"

I leaned closer to her and whispered, "I have to go."

"And?"

I indicated my back end. "How do I get this into a bathroom?"

"Well, my other patients with a body type like that just relieve themselves wherever they happen to be."

"So you think I should just go? Right in front of you?"

"If I see anything I've never seen before, I'll let you know."

Taking a deep breath, I took her advice.

"Better?"

I nodded, but then I inhaled through my nose. "Oh, man."

"I don't even notice it anymore, Julie."

She went through my examination, then went to bring Mom into the stable. "What do you think, Doctor?" Mom asked.

"Based on my examination," the vet replied, "Julie's heart, respiratory system, and esophagus are in her human trunk. The rest of her digestive system and her reproductive system are in her barrel. I would recommended that we wait for her to reach adulthood before shoeing her. Overall, I would say that she appears to be healthy. I would like to continue treating her, if I may."

"Absolutely, just don't mention this to anyone."

"You have my word." Turning to me, she said, "That's a very striking necklace you have on. Where did you get it?"

I pulled it out of my shirt. "My little sister, Emma, said she found it on my bedroom door yesterday."

"Yesterday, eh?"

"Do you think that necklace has something to do with this?" Mom asked.

"I don't know. But I've seen a necklace like it only once before, in the possession of a local woman. Perhaps you might ask her about it."
15121111111111111.title: The Vet

151211111111111111.content:
Mom went to talk to this woman, a Mrs. Fearon. If Mom was satisfied that Mrs. Fearon could help us, she would bring her to me. I didn't know if I wanted to walk through town, so that plan sounded good to me.

After I was left alone again, however, I got bored standing around in a stall in the stable. Letting myself out into the corral, I took a walk. It was odd how quickly I adjusted to walking on four legs, until I considered how quickly I had adjusted to becoming a girl. Whatever was behind my becoming a centaur mare, it didn't want me taking days to get used to my body.

As I became more confident, my walk became a trot, then a gallop. I loved feeling the wind blowing on my face and through my hair.

"Julie!"

I turned. Mom was back, and she had a positively ancient woman who must have been Mrs. Fearon with her. And she wasn't happy to see me in the corral.

"What are you doing? What if a stranger came? You would have been seen."

I shrugged. "I can't be cooped up in a stall forever, Mom. I'm not built for it. Besides, I'll have to be out of the stall when you muck it out."

"She has a point," Mrs. Fearon said.

I cantered up to Mrs. Fearon. "So I guess Mom has told you about me. Now I need you to tell me about this." I pulled the necklace out of my shirt. "Where did it come from? Why did it change me? What does it mean?"

"The answer is as simple as it is complicated," Mrs. Fearon said. "You have been chosen."
151211111111111111.title: The Necklace

1512111111111111112.content:
Mrs. Fearon smiled kindly. "This is no ordinary great forest, my dear." Calmly, she explained. "It shelters many thought to be extinct or non-existent animals of the time of man and legend."

"What does that have to do with me?" Curious, I asked. "I know I moved to protect these forests from a lumber company a few years back but..."

"That's just it... you were the first to stand up against the company and moved the entire town to follow you." Firmly, Mrs. Fearon said. "For that reason, you were chosen."

"Chosen for what?" Worried, I asked.

"To be their protector, of course." Smiling, Mrs. Fearon replied. "Just as I was many years ago." She patted the small of my back. "Only I was not a centaur..."

"What were you then?" curious, mom asked.

Mrs. Fearon again smiled and produced a golden necklace with the image of a tree. "I am an ecomancer." Softly, she said. "When I started my journey, I was transformed into a great tree." She giggled. "I terrified me at first then I found I could move and had stepped out of the tree like a butterfly from its cocoon."

"What is an ecomancer?" confused, I asked.

"An ecomancer comes from Greek Mythology." Calmly, mom explained. "they have the ability to talk to and control plants."

Mrs. Fearon nodded. "I take it you heard a legend that states all woes will pass with the promise of the centaur."

Mom and I nodded to which Mrs. Fearon motioned to the forest. "The forest provides to those who protect it." Serious, she said. "I live in the forest in my old age because I have no one to care for me outside of it."

"Well, you can come to us." Kindly mom offered. "If anything for company."

"I would like that." Nodding, Mrs. Fearon said. "For now, let us discuss the powers given to you as a centaur. First, you have the power to..."
1512111111111111112.title: Reader's choice

15121111111111111122.content:
"You can enrich the soil where you pass," Mrs. Fearon said.

"How do I do that?"

"The most natural way, of course."

My jaw dropped. "You mean by... Are you telling me I can save the world with my - "

"Manure," Mom finished for me, although I had a shorter word in mind.

Mrs. Fearon nodded. "A teaspoonful in a flower pot will produce astounding results. A daily deposit in the forest will sustain it immensely."

Mom decided to check this out.

"Okay," I said, "I can help the forest with my puckey. What all is it okay for me to eat? I mean, I ate two apples, core and all. Is that bad? What foods should I avoid?"

"Like horses, centaurs are omnivorous. You can eat whatever you like. And , like a horse, you have a digestive system capable of handling apple cores."

"Okay. What else can I do?"

"You can change two people into centaurs. The first to be your mate, the second to be your successor. So you'll want to be sure of both."

"I think it'll be a while before I look for either. First, I'm thinking about my family. Wait until Sandra sees me. As for Emma, I know one little girl who deserves a ride."
15121111111111111122.title: enrich any soil.

choices: My First Foray into the Forest
151211111111111111221.content:
Mom replanted a flower that she had been struggling with, using a sample from my road apples. After that, she left me at the ranch for a while.

When she returned, she had Andy and Emma with her. "We'll move back here piecemeal," Mom said.

Andy was amazed to see the new me, but Emma couldn't be more excited. "You're a centaur girl! A real live centaur girl! I can't believe it!"

"Believe it, kiddo," I said.

"I'm going to get some more of our things," Mom said, "and also some pizza. Over time, we'll think of some ways to make the stable a little more homey."

"Mommy," Emma asked, "can I ride Julie?"

"Can I?" added Andy.

"It's not up to me, it's up to your sister. It's her back, after all."

I responded with a smile.

Emma cheered. "When a centaur girl smiles, that means yes!"

******************************


Emma got the first ride. "What's it like, being a centaur girl?" she asked.

"It feels great, now that the changes are done. When I eat an apple, I eat it, core and all. And my poops make a great fertilizer. Thank you, Emma."

"Why thank me?"

"Your wish is part of the reason I'm like this now. The mystic forces were grateful for my conservation efforts, but your wish told them that we needed help, too. Thank you."
151211111111111111221.title: Giving Emma a Ride

choices: I Find Something on My Way Back
1512111111111111112211.content:
I awoke lying on the floor of my stall, to the gentle calls of Mom and Emma. As I got to my hooves, Mom asked, "How did you sleep? I read that horses get REM sleep when they lie down."

"I had some dreams," I replied. "Mostly about me galloping wherever I wanted, letting the girls bounce freely."

"Mostly? What else did you dream about?"

I blushed.

"I'll take that as meaning it's none of my business," Mom said. "We're here because grooming isn't something you can do by yourself anymore." She put a plastic basin filled with soapy water and a bucket of plain water into my stall, while I took off my sleep shirt.

My new grooming routine went like this: I would start by giving my upper body a sponge bath. Then, I would get my hair wet, while Mom did the same to my tail. Both got washed with horse shampoo. Then, I would brush my hair, while Emma curried my coat and Mom brushed my tail. When Mom was done, she tied a pink ribbon around the base of my tail.

"Can I ride you, Julie?" Emma asked.

"Later on, kiddo," I promised. "I have a job to do this morning." I put on a bra (Mom guessed my size right) and one of Sandra's tops. "How's that flower coming?"

"Extraordinary," Mom said. "I no longer have a brown thumb."

Mom and Emma took turns climbing a stepladder so I could give them a hug and a kiss, then I let myself into the corral. Doing three laps at full gallop, I charged at the fence and jumped over it, then went into the forest.

Once I got deep enough into the forest, I slowed down, and I heard cooing, and saw birds flying around me. I extended my index fingers, and two of the cooing birds lit on them. Even though I had never seen a picture of one, I knew that they were passenger pigeons, just as they knew that I would not harm them.

Deciding that this was as good a spot as any, I let flop.
1512111111111111112211.title: My First Foray into the Forest

15121111111111111122111.content:
It was an amazing experience, there in the forest. I saw dodos, quaggas, California grizzlies, and every other creature that had to come here to flee the unprecedented danger that is humanity. I had known that we had hunted animals to extinction, but here, surrounded by the lucky ones, I wept for the beasts who had died just so someone could look at their preserved corpses in his den and feel some twisted sense of satisfaction.

Finally deciding I had spent enough time there for one day, I turned my hooves homeward. I might not return to this exact spot, but I would come back to the forest tomorrow, to perform my sacred duties.

As I trotted, I heard the scream of a great golden eagle, and saw something fall to the forest floor. Upon approaching it,I saw that it was a brown fabric bag. I picked up the bag and continued on my way.

Leaving the forest precisely where I'd entered, I ran for the fence and jumped into the corral. "How was it?" Mom asked.

"Incredible," I replied. "Beautiful. And tragic."

"I guess that explains why you've been crying. I made breakfast. Given the size of a horse's stomach, I hope I made enough. What's that you've got there?"

"Something that a great golden eagle dropped in front of me. I haven't had time to look at it yet." I opened the bag. "Holy shit."

"Language, young lady. Let me see."

I pulled out some of the bag's contents.

"Holy shit," Mom said.

The eagle had given me a bag of gold coins.
15121111111111111122111.title: I Find Something on My Way Back

151211111111111111221111.content:
Mom and I briefly celebrated our good fortune then turned to Mrs. Fearon who had stopped by for a visit. "I take it you received a gift from the forest." Softly, she said.

I nodded and showed her the bag of gold coins. "I'm just not sure where to exchange them for cash without a lot of questions being asked."

Mrs. Fearon smiled. "I know of a place." Kindly, she said. "If Mrs Mrs. Walker would be so kind as to drive me..."

"Of course." smiling, mom said. She turned to me. "We'll be back as soon as we can and then we will discuss what to do with the money."

Shortly after, mom and Mrs. Fearon left and I was alone until my sister and brother returned from school on the bus. I decided to trot around the property near the barn just to get some wind into my hair. I began to try a few simple jumps and turns like I had seen in horse shows on television and quickly began to enjoy myself. Only I tripped slightly on one jumps and stumbled slightly. I did not fall but it was enough to cause me to blush. That was when i heard a chuckle from the forest...

I whipped my head around, blushing more and spotted him... a Centaur Colt watching me from the edge of the woods! He seemed to be around my age and blushed upon realizing I had spotted him. He gave a shy wave with a nervous smile then galloped away back into the forest. "Wait...!" Blushing, I called.

Only the Centaur Colt was gone and I doubted I would be able to chase him down so I ended up just standing there, staring at the forest. I did not even notice Andy or Emma get off the bus and run to me. "Hey, Julie, how was your day?" Smiling, Emma asked.

"Hi..." Dreamily, I said.

Andy and Emma looked at each other then turned to me, concerned. "Are you okay?" Patting my side, Andy asked.

"Hi..." Softly, I said.
151211111111111111221111.title: Unexpected Visitor

1512111111111111112211111.content:
When Mom got home, she first asked the kids how their day at school was. Both had a pleasant time, and neither mentioned their older brother turned sister turned mythical creature.

"I suppose you're all wondering about the value of those gold coins Julie received," Mom said. "Well, let's just say they're enough to pay off our creditors. Thanks to Julie and the forest, we've got a bit of breathing room."

Andy and Emma cheered.

Once they settled down again, I said, "Mom, there's a centaur colt in the forest."

"What's a colt?" Andy asked.

"It's a boy horse," I explained. "He's a colt, and I'm a filly."

Mom sat down. "I guess I'd better look up horse reproduction, so I can give you that talk. Tell me all about it."

So I did, from my attempted jumping routine to my efforts to coax him back out of the forest.

When I was finished, Mom said, "So, you're smitten with this colt, I take it?"

"I... I guess so."

"Well, I can't forbid you from seeing him again, but I ask you to take things slowly with him. You're not even old enough to be shod, let alone have a serious relationship. The last thing I want is for you to be stuck with a foal at your age."

"What's a foal?"

"It's a baby horse," Mom and I said in unison.

Turning to Mom, I said, "I understand, and I agree that I'm not old enough yet to be getting serious. But, if I can, I'd like to see him again."

"As I said, there's nothing I can do to stop you. So, yes, you may see him again, if he wants to be seen. Now, how about I start dinner, while the three of you play?"

As before, us playing mainly consisted of me giving rides.
1512111111111111112211111.title: Mom returns home.

15121111111111111122111111.content:
It was just before dinner when the colt centaur reappeared at the edge of the forest. Andy and Emma spotted him first and waved, smiling. "Come on over!" Smiling, Emma said. "Don't be shy!"

The colt took a step forward but paused to which Andy called out, "We don't bite!"

I slowly stepped forward. "My name is Julie Walker." Blushing, I said. "This is my brother, Andy and my sister, Emma."

"My name is Roan." Shyly, the colt replied. "I became a centaur colt not too long ago... I did not know there were others like me..."

"Nor did I..." Smiling slightly, I said.

Roan slowly came closer and I was able to see that he had longish red hair and green eyes with a very muscular build. It did not take long for me to realize he had been sizing me up as well. We both blushed, staring at each other for a moment before Emma blurted out, "We're about to have dinner... are you hungry?"

"Out of the mouths of babes..." Blushing more, I thought.

Fortunately, mom stepped out before things got too awkward and smiled kindly at Roan who smiled back, taking a small step backwards. "Now, now... you came this far, young man." Smiling, mom said. "There is no sense in getting shy now."

Roan blushed more, if that was possible. "Your daughter invited me for dinner." Softly, he said. "I do not wish to impose though..."

"Nonsense." Maintaining her smile, mom said. "You are welcome to join us." She then opened the gate for Roan to walk through. "Just bear in mind that you two are still very young and need to take things slowly..."

"Mom...!" Blushing more, I protested.

I was mortified that mom would say such a thing only Roan chuckled. "My mother said the same thing when I mentioned that I had seen you and wanted to talk to you." Blushing, he said. He held up a necklace of a centaur like mine only it was facing the opposite direction. "I was a normal teen girl before I was changed..."

"I- I was a teenage boy before all of this..."

"I can see we all have a lot to talk about." Kindly, mom said. "We'll all have dinner in the barn together." She turned to Emma and Andy. "Can you two be dears and set up the folding table?"

Emma and Andy raced each other towards the barn while mom escorted us not too far behind...
15121111111111111122111111.title: The Centaur Colt Returns

151211111111111111221111111.content:
"So, tell us about yourself, Roan," Mom said, as we came to the table to eat.

"Well," he said, "I was born Naor O'Donnell. My dad ran a logging company, up until they lost the fight over this forest. He started drinking, and, to make a long story short, he doesn't live with us anymore."

"How did you come by your necklace?" I asked.

"I just found it. I thought it was interesting, so I put it on. Next thing I know, my muscles are getting bigger, and my chest is getting smaller. Then, the next day, I turned into this."

"How much do you know about... us?" I asked, indicating my ears and barrel to show what I meant.

"I'm healthy. Up until this morning, I didn't know there was such a thing as us. Were things the same for you?"

"Not much. The necklace materialized on my doorknob. Once I became a centaur, Mom called in the local vet, who told us about an old woman who knew about the necklace. Long story short, I had helped to protect the forest, so I was chosen to safeguard it full time."

"Is that why I've been drawn to the forest?"

"I think so. It's a special place. It's a shelter for the animals that humans think they've hunted to extinction. We sustain the forest."

"How are we supposed to sustain an entire forest?"

"Our manure is a terrific fertilizer, as Mom can attest."

"It's true," Mom said. "Even my brown thumb can't kill a plant nourished by your output."

"After dinner," I said, "I'll take you into the forest, let you see it for yourself."
151211111111111111221111111.title: dinner conversations.

15122.content:
Emma had with her a bracelet that seemed to have cat fangs on it. Well, that's what I deduced anyway.

"Where did you get that?" I asked her.

"I'll tell you if you come to my room" said Emma. I sighed and decided to follow her. I had no idea what she had in mind but I would get to the bottem of it somehow. Along the way though, things got a little more interesting.

"Do you want this?" asked Emma, offering the bracelet to me. I was confused as to why she would offer me such a tinket to me. I really wasn't the accesory type of person. However, there seemed to be something that drew me torwards the bracelet, almost like gravity pulling me to it.

"I don't know" I told her. I was trying to distance myself from whatever that bracelet was using on me. However, Emma didn't really like the answer.

"Oh kind on, please?" she pleaded with me. I sighed as there would be no getting out of this for me.

"All right, I'll take it" I said to her, giving up in the process. Emma smiled and helped me put on the bracelet. It was positioned so that the fanged portions were on the top of my hand. However, right when it was fastened on, I almost felt as if the fangs drew right down into my skin.

"Ugh!" I grunted in slight pain. It was almost like the thing was a mouth and it wouldn't let up on me. Suddenly, the pain stopped and I was able to look down at it. There seemed to be some slight redness where the bracelet was. I pretty much figured that I wasn't imagining it now.

"What's wrong brother?" asked Emma.

"Nothing" I responded. I didn't need her to know about what I was thinking about. Anyway, we proceeded to Emma's room where she showed me a view from her window. There was a statue of a cat there. Whoever had this house before us apparently believed in cats as come sort of guardians, kind of like the egyptians to an extent. I found it pretty wierd. However, we also had a centaur statue as we believed it brought good luck considering we owned a horse ranch some ways from here. Guess, we're just as weird.

"I found that bracelet near that statue. I've always liked that statue though. You think it really protects us?" she asked me.

"Well, maybe it does" was the best I could come up with as I subtlely scratched my chest. 'What is wrong with me?' I thought to myself.
15122.title: a cat fang bracelet

151221.content:
Following my conversation with Emma, I went downstairs to go eat breakfast and clear my thoughts. What was up with this wierd bracelet? And what's up with my body? I had so many questions but no answers at all.

"Hopefully, things will become clear soon" I told myself. I had no idea about how right I was.

I found my way into the kitchen where my little brother Andy was. He was happily eating his usual cereal. I decided to pour a meal of my own as well. So, I found the cereal I liked and got a glass of milk as usual. Funny thing though, I seemed to have more interest in the milk than the cereal.

I went to the table and started eating. However, like I just mentioned, I gulped down the milk like it was nothing, surprising Andy.

"Wow brother, I didn't know you could drink that fast!" said the amused little boy.

"Really?" I asked. Maybe I just didn't notice something but it seemed to taste better now than usual. So wierd.

"Yeah, you're almost like Kate" said Andy. Kate was a girl that was about a year or 2 younger than me. We lived in the same neighborhood so it wasn't hard to meet. Honestly, I've always felt odd about Kate. She often at times acted wacko. She seems to have a liking for birds and fish. A HUGE liking I should say. She also seemed to like milk too. 1512211121.content:
I woke up, lying near the cat statue with what seemed to be a girl in a cat costume, looking down at me. She smiled as I slowly sat up. "Neyow, welcome, Jamie."

"Jamie?" I asked, seeing all the cats from before sitting all around us. "I'm James."

The girl shook her head. "You were James." she replied politely. "Now you are Jamie. I asked my friends to bring you here so we cold talk, you deserve an explanation as to what is happening to you."

"That would be nice." I said, now more awake. "First, who are you?"

"My name is Katina Feline, I am Kate's older sister." replied the girl. "We are Nekos, humanoid animals. In this case, cats, hence my last name."

"Okay..." I said, slightly freaked out. "So, I'm somehow turning into one of you?"

Katina nodded. "Your sister, Emma, made a wish to one of our prayer statues." she explained. "They are our version of your churches, the largest of such statues you call the Great Sphinx." she paused. "To the point, we sent Emma a bracelet that would allow her to become one of us and gain the aid of the pride."

"Only she gave it to me." I said, piecing the story together.

Katina nodded. "Hence your transformation began." she said. "Normally, it would be painless but you were not well when you put it on so it is, unfortunately, making the symptoms worse." she paused, smiling. "The purring that put you to sleep has a healing factor, notice that your stomach no longer hurts."

My eyes widened in surprise as I had not noticed any pain in a while and slowly nodded at Katina. "So what now?" I asked her. "Am I expected to join your pride?"

Katina giggled, it was soft and sweet. "You joined us the second you put on that bracelet." she said. "Do not think badly of us, you put it on under your own free will without examining the engraving."

Curious, I turned to the bracelet and found the engraving. It stated...

'He who choses to wear this bracelet will become one with the Nekos.'

Paling, I turned to Katina. "How will I live a normal life, being a boy, turned girl, let alone a Neko-girl!?" I asked, panicking. "My life is ruined... it's over!"

I began to sob when Katina placed a light hand onto my shoulder. "Have you ever seen cat ears or a tail on my sister?" she asked, sweetly. "We Nekos have the ability to look perfectly normal with a small amount of magic, which you will learn in time. "First, however, you must complete your transformation."

With that, I felt a sharp pain in my lower back, which caused me to scream. Slowly, painfully, a tail began to form and grow from my tail bone to a length equivalent to a cat my size. I screamed again, seeing my human ears moved upward and slowly took the shape of cat ears near the top of my head. A loud Neyow escaped my lips as I then felt my face shifting, making my nose smaller and my mouth more uniformly shaped to that of a cat. When the changes finally stopped, I found myself gasping from the pain as the cats around me began to purr at once, like before, ebbing it away.

"Welcome to the pride, Jamie Walker." said Katina. "When you wake up tomorrow, reality will have changed and all will know you as Jamie. Only you, your sister, Emma, and the pride will know the old you."

"What about teaching me that magic to make me look normal?" I asked, hearing the cats purring again.

Katina laughed. "We will teach you as you sleep." she replied. "Rest well, Jamie. We will be in touch."

With that, I again passed out to awaken...
1512211121.title: A New Crowd

15122111212.content:
I woke up to the sound of purring...only this time it wasn't coming anywhere around me. It was coming from my own body.

That immediately shocked me awake. For a brief instant I thought that this all was just some elaborate dream.

"Hey sleepy-head!" you could hear from behind you, looking over you saw Kate in her real form. She really didn't seem a whole lot different from her human self. She was perhaps a little more furry in certain spots. Sure her face was catlike in appearance as she had a little button nose to go with her golden, oblong shaped eyes. Her ears and tail matched her orange colored hair...

...And she was naked. Yeah, that was kind of hard to miss. Then you looked at yourself only to realize you were naked, too.

Blushing you immediately flailed your arms in attempt to cover yourself, to little avail. All Kate could do is laugh.

"You can relax, Jamie," she said. "We're Nekos, not Humans. Moving around like this is actually quite normal."

"It is?" you responded in disbelief.

"Of course," she answered. "Humans tend to be a little more paranoid about their bodies. They treat them as if they're harbingers of lust, and cover them to prevent their impulses from taking over. But what's wrong with appreciating what nature has given you? It's only bad if you make it bad."

She did kind of made a point, although spending my life living as a human it would be hard to break certain customs and expectations.

"We're the only ones here," she added. "Trust me, you're safe."

Slowly I put my arms down. She just looked at me and smiled. "We're going to have to break those human habits."

"Where are we?" I asked. Looking around all I could see is trees and vegetation all around me.

"This is the Lost Forest," she explained. "These are the woods outside of town. Think of it as a sanctuary for us Nekos. It's been blessed so no humans can enter. If they try they eventually get lost and wind up where they once began."

"Sounds convenient," I replied.

"Sure is!" she exclaimed. "Here you can be your true self. It's kinda hard to do so when humans cover the entire earth!"

"I suppose it would be," I responded.

"You don't seem real thrilled!" she said, somewhat pouting in the process.

"It's not that," I explained. "It's just...it's a lot to take in. It's not every day you turn from a boy to a girl, especially into a girl that isn't even human."

"Well, that's just it," Kate began, "only girls can be Nekos. Keeping your sex wasn't an option."

"You serious?" I said, surprised. "Then how do you procreate? How do you keep from going extinct?"

"The same way you did," she answered. "We seek out a few chosen girls and we give them a bracelet. Those bracelets transform those girls into Nekos."

"I see," you said dejectedly.

"It wasn't meant for you, Jamie," she said. "Emma prayed to us, and we gave the bracelet to her. However it was you who put it on. To be honest, I've always been curious what would happen if a man did put it on. Guess I know nyeow!"

"It wasn't as if I wanted to become a Neko!" I assured her. "I...I don't know. I just saw it and something told me to put it on. Emma persisted and well, here we are."

"Weird," she replied. "Well, just so you know I'm gonna do my best to help you adapt as best as you can! Just because you're a female and a Neko doesn't mean you can't have a normal life!"

"Can I truly live a normal life?" I asked, not sure I could believe that.

"Of course!" she exclaimed. "Don't forget, just a few days ago you didn't even realize I was a Neko at all! Just like you and everyone else I was once a human too! I still have parents and a family and everything else, and with a little bit of Katina's magic we can make it so no one even remembers James existed."

"That...isn't something I'm entirely looking forward to," I told her.

"I know," she said as she gave me a warm hug, making me feel a little more awkward than before. "I wish I could fix that but the bracelet chose you. It's not something that can be changed. But trust me, being a girl isn't all that bad."

She nuzzled me on my neck and then released me. For some reason it felt real good being close to her. She just sets my mind at ease.

"Come on!" she urged me. "We got some training to do!"

I figured I was hitting the ball the same way I was always hitting it, but for some reason, Jason felt like I was hitting it harder than usual.

“Dude! I’m still returning your balls, but you’re keeping me behind the baseline! You’re hitting too hard!” Jason said at one point.

“Oh… Sorry man… I’ll ease up a bit…” I replied.

I tried to slow things down, but I gathered that I got right back to returning my balls even harder again. Finally, he returned a ball that made me run to the opposite end of the court. I ran to get it and I made it, but in the process, I hit the ball high and hard, sending it soaring high above the fence, far behind the point where Jason was standing!

“Man! You just knocked the ball over the fence! Why are you hitting so hard?”

“Uhh…”

“Let’s take a break, Rex! You’re killing me on the court, dude!” Jason sighed.

We both walked back to the bench, where our bags were, and we too some gulps from our water bottles. Then we just collected our balls from the court, before we walked out and returned to the small snack bar which was located in the main building overseeing all the tennis courts. Once we had arrived, I quickly walked to the men’s room, where I had to relieve myself. As I checked myself out in the mirror, I gasped out loud when I discovered that the green rash had grown!

“Holy crap!” I said to myself.

The rash had increased from my upper arm past my elbow. Not only had that, but my biceps on both arms become noticeably bigger at the same time. That probably explained why I was hitting the ball with so much force. What was going on here?

I was freaking out here. I just got a soda at the snack bar and I said bye to Jason before I quickly hurried back home. I figured the best thing to do now was waiting for mom to get off work, so I could show her my arm. Not only was I turning green, but I was becoming more muscular in the process. What the heck was going on with me?
152112.title: Rex goes to play tennis with his friends.

1521122.content:
I decided to take a walk though the woods to clear my head, try to keep myself calm and focused. I guess it was the 'nerd' in me that was telling me to do so as I was more the athletic type. "There has to be a rational explanation to all of this." I said to myself, briskly walking down an empty path. "Maybe its something genetic, mom did say that grandpa was working on something in Brazil, maybe he died of what I'm now getting."

The thought shook me to the core and I quickly pushed it out of my mind. "come on, Rex!" I whispered. "Get a hold of yourself, you're not going to die!"

"Not today, anyway." replied a voice behind me.

"Who's there!?" I demanded, turning around.

"If I wanted you to know that, I would have shown myself by now." replied the voice.

"I am far from in the mood for games!" I hissed, slowly becoming annoyed. "What do you want!?"

"For now, nothing." replied the voice. "Just mind that temper of yours."

With that, the voice said nothing else. I looked around for several minutes but found no one. "That was creepy." I said to myself, feeling hot everywhere. "I better get myself home."

I started walking down the path at a faster pace, knowing that my house was less than a block away from the edge of the woods, hoping to avoid bumping into who ever it was who spoke to me. As I walked, I could not help feel as if several eyes were watching me from the trees around me. I tried to ignore the nagging feeling but it would not leave me.

"I got to get home." I thought, desperately. "I have a very bad feeling..."

Fortunately, you reached the edge of the woods without incident and made a mad dash along the sidewalk for your front door, not daring to look back...

Once finally inside your house, you ran into the bathroom and disrobed to find that the rash was now on your other arm as well, causing you to shake slightly. Then, you looked in the mirror and found that...
1521122.title: a stranger with a strange warning.

15211221.content:
Once finally inside my house, you ran into the bathroom and disrobed to find that the rash was now on my other arm as well, causing me to shake slightly. Then, I looked in the mirror and found that my eyes were glowing, almost pulsating with rapid heart beat. To say I was shaken would have been an understatement as i watched my eyes glowing, as if with a life of their own. "Now I've seen everything." I muttered, shaking my head. "I need to relax before I drive myself crazy."

In an attempt to make myself laugh, I began to make silly poses in front of the mirror. I flexed my newly enlarged biceps then flexed all of my muscles at once as if i were posing for a he man competition. That proved to be a mistake as, upon doing so, I felt my body heat increase to a nearly intolerable level as my muscles began to swell like a balloon! On top of that, the green rash exploded into growth, covering all of my skin within seconds. I could hear my sneakers moan then pop like a tire hitting a nail on the freeway, I heard the rip of my jeans as they fell to my growing size. In all, before I could react, I no longer saw myself in the mirror but a seven foot tall behemoth! I screamed in terror but the scream that echoed from my throat sounded more like an animalistic roar. The power of it shook the room as the mirror cracked and the bathroom window shattered!

"No! No! No!" I cried, my own voice coming through. "This is not happening! It's not happening!"

I screamed again, the roar shaking to room again as I ran out of the bathroom. Only, at my new size, I made two semi circular holes in the wall on each side of the door frame, destroying it. "9-11!" I yelled in a panic. "Someone call 9-1-1!!"

As I ran down the hall, I was too panicked to realize that I was knocking all of the pictures off the wall as my form barely fit in space provided. I let out another roar like scream as I destroyed a table with my foot in my hate to reach the stairs. In fact, everything in my path was either knocked down or reduced to splinters, causing me to panic even more.

"No! No!" I screamed. "Got to get help! Got get help!"

Unknown to me, my neighbors on both sides of my house heard my cries for help and the terrifying roar of some animal and both called 9-1-1, fearing for my safety. "He's being attacked by some large animal, bring someone down here now!" urged Mrs Samson, who lived to my right.

"That's right, officer." said Mr. Hanks, who lived to my left. "The boy is being mauled by an animal. Bring some help now unless you want me to unpack my shotgun."

Inside my house, unaware that help was on the way, I ran down the stairs but nearly tripped three times as my foot went through the wood. I screamed the first time, coming out like a roar, and literally destroyed the step by swinging my foot out, sending the splinters through the air like missiles. The front two windows of the house were shattered by the first run of splinters. The other two times, the fragments of wood became embedded in the wall, making me scream/roar again. During this entire time, I was scratching myself everywhere, sending trickles of blood down my body, making it appear as if I had been torn asunder.

"Mom's going to kill me!" I cried, distraught. "She'll kill me, she'll kill me!"

My neighbors on both sides heard me and became more fearful as several squad cars, an ambulance, and an animal control vehicle arrived in front of my house. I was too stricken with panic to hear them and grabbed the first phone I could find and accidentally destroyed it by simply picking it up. I screamed/roared again then angrily threw the destroyed phone, smashing what was left of it against the front door. Outside, the police officers winced, fearful for my safety and moved in, expecting to find a bear or a tiger someone had kept as a pet and let loose.

"Be on your toes, men!" said the Sergent in charge. "We may be walking into a blood bath!"


In that same instant, as I picked up another telephone, I saw the flashing lights of the squad cars and let out a low sigh of relief. "Help is here." I said, with a hiccup type laugh. "Thank goodness!"

With that feeling of relief, I felt my body dwindling down, my muscles shrinking and, unknown to me, my rash receding back to what it was before my terrifying transformation. Only, the change back left me weak and I slumped to the floor, still holding onto the telephone receiver.

Hours later, I woke up...
15211221.title: Monster Mash!

choices: Back at school, that green rash begins to appear again.
Rex is bullied during recess at school.
152112211.content:
“Mrs. Tyrone?” the nurse asked mom. “Your son is right over here, in this room on the right!”

The nurse led mom, Rachel Tyrone, into the small room, where I was laying quietly in a bed. I had an IV stuck in my arm, and I was barely awake.

“Hey, buddy! What a way to spend your birthday, huh?” mom said to me. “What happened? You almost tore down the house!”

“The rash… It got worse!” I mumbled to mom. “My muscles kept on getting bigger and bigger. So, I just stood in the bathroom in front of the mirror and I flexed my arms, my chest and my legs, and then all my muscles started to grow until I was as big as a giant!”

“What?”

“I swear! My head almost came to the ceiling and I was completely green from head to toe! And my muscles were enormous!”

Mom let out a deep sigh.

“Ohhh dear… Rex… You hulked out… Just liked grandpa…”

“What? What are you talking about, mom?” I asked mom.

Mom let out a deep sigh.

“Mom? Is there something you need to tell me?” I insisted.

“Rex… Grandpa didn’t just move to Brazil and die…” mom began, as tears started running down her face. “Grandpa had a condition which is similar to what you’re going through!”

It took a moment for that to sink in. I couldn’t believe what I had just heard, as my mouth dropped open in complete disbelief.

“Grandpa would turn green? Just like me?”

“Yes! Grandpa was a brilliant scientist, Rex!” mom explained. “Your grandpa, my dad, was known as Dr. Robert Bruce Banner. He was in the middle of researching this machine which emitted these powerful gamma rays. This was powerful radiation, which supposedly could make muscle tissue expand and give a living being superhuman strength. Well, somehow the experiment went wrong and there was a gamma bomb that went off in his lab in Dayton, Ohio. Grandpa didn’t get away in time, and he got exposed to the radiation which altered his body.”

“So… What happened to grandpa?” I asked mom. “What happened to him after he got exposed?”

“Whenever he got angry, this gamma radiation triggered this muscular growth… grandpa’s skin would turn green and every muscle in his body would swell. My dad would grow big and tall and strong until he would transform into this huge muscular man, that everyone started calling ‘The Hulk’”.

“Oh man… That… That almost sounds like what happened to me…” I whispered to myself. “I guess, that makes me the next generation of the Hulk…”

“Yes, I’m afraid so, sweetheart…”

“Mom… Am I turning into some kind of a monster?” I asked her.

“You’re not a monster! You’re a boy who inherited a condition which makes you big and strong…” she replied.

“It makes me big and ugly and GREEN!” I shouted. “I don’t like being green!”

Mom just stared at me with sadness. I guess there was nothing I could do about this condition other than accept it for now.
152112211.title: In a hospital.

choices: Rex helps a friend, and Hulks out at school!
A friend gets Rex in trouble at school!
1521122111.content:
My mom told the doctors at the hospital that I had not eaten anything at all that day and that I had just fainted or something at the house that day. She certainly did everything she could in order to avoid having to explain me getting green skin and hulking out into a green giant with huge muscles! Furthermore, they really didn’t find anything else wrong with me, after they had taken my vital signs in the hospital. My blood pressure was a bit high, and I had not eaten anything, so my mom just took the blame for that and I was released.

Mom quickly drove me home and she made me some chicken and green beans (more green stuff!) in the microwave. We had a quiet supper together, and she repeatedly asked me how I was feeling. I was actually feeling more tired than anything, so I just took a nice cold shower before I went to bed early.

On Sunday I just packed my backpack for school and I focused on my homework. While I was studying, I noticed that my arm started developing that green rash again! It seemed like something that was recurring; like it would come back on a daily basis. I was almost afraid that I would have this weird growth spurt every day!

“Oh man… Here we go again!” I said to myself, as I glanced at the green patch of skin on my lower arm, just between my wrist and my elbow on my right arm. Then, when I looked over, the same thing was happening on my left arm as well.

I quickly got up and walked to the bathroom so I could examine my reflection in the cracked mirror, which was hanging from the wall. To my great shock, I saw that my eyes were once again glowing a bright, lime green, and my face was slowly turning that same lime green as well.

“It’s coming again… It’s growing… It’s coming out… It wants to come out of me…” I whispered to myself as I stood in the bathroom.

This time, however, I was determined to remain calm. I wasn’t going to panic. If this green, big, ‘Hulk’ figure was going to burst out of my skin and take over my body, and then I would let it, without causing a panic! I had made up my mind that I was going to do whatever it takes to control this thing.

“Alright! I-I’m here! Now… Stay calm… Rex… Breathe in… Breathe out! You’re turning green again… Muscles age growing… I see it… I can feel it… I’m feeling stronger…” I said calmly, as I felt my heartbeat increase slightly.

I just raised my right arm without flexing it… I noticed that my biceps had gotten bigger! I slowly looked down and noticed that my chest started to bulge out as well. Wow, my chest was really getting big! Two big, round balls of muscle were sticking out from my chest. Below that, I saw how I had all these abdominals covering my stomach. My legs were also bigger and wider and my calves looked like they had grown a lot as well!

“Okay… I’m in control… I’m the boss here… This is MY body… Let’s see… What did I do yesterday? I flexed my arms and my legs and everything else and then everything just got really BIG!” I pondered as I continued to examine myself in the mirror.

“Maybe if I just relax, it will go away…”

I took a few deep breaths as I closed my eyes, hoping that I could control this hulk-thing. When I opened my eyes again, I saw that the pupils in my eyes were very, very bright-green!

“Okay… Hold on… Take it easy… If I become big again…I’m not gonna move… Stay calm…” I said to myself, as I made my fists and slowly tensed my muscles, one by one.

I flexed both of my biceps and my abs and my pectorals and my quads as well as my calves… Just for a moment… Like a few seconds… Then, I opened my eyes and I saw that green rash rapidly spreading all over my body! My face; my ears; my nose; my lips; my arms; my hands; my feet; my legs; my chest… everywhere! I was completely green!

Then, it happened! For a few seconds, I was overcome by this intense cramp feeling in every muscle in my body! Then everything started to grow very quickly! It happened so fast, that I can barely describe it! My arms grew bigger and longer as my legs become longer and thicker, as they swell with incredible muscle! My quads just explode with layers of muscle as they grow thicker and wider at the same time! My calves become as round as soccer balls, and my biceps inflate until they’re even bigger than bowling balls and they’re just as hard even! My entire body grows bigger and taller, where I quickly stretch from 5 foot 4 inches to about 7 feet in height in just a few seconds! Amazing!

“ARRRGHHHH!!!!!” I roar in the bathroom as I hulk outward, sideways, and upward as my body grows in every direction as it turns completely lime-green all over! My face changes too! My jaw becomes more angular and my hair turns shades of green. My head actually becomes squarer as my face stretches upward and sideways a little bit. My ears and nose grow out a bit, like everything just gets bigger!

Luckily I wasn’t wearing a shirt, pants or shoes, because I would have ripped out of them! My feet grew to twice as big, twice as wide and much heavier than before. My toes were big and thick! And green! The same counts for my hands, which become twice as big as before with fingers that are enormous!

Finally, the growth stopped, leaving me standing there, looking in the mirror at this big, green figure, who is staring back at me.

“Whoa… I’m big again…”

Even my voice sounded a bit deeper than before. I speak with a baritone voice, as I flex my arm, revealing an enormous bicep popping up on my arm. The one good thing about this is that I’m feeling strong… Really freaking, enormously strong… Strong enough that I can lift a tank!

“Okay… It happened… I changed… Stay calm… I’m still here… I’m still me…” I said to myself, making sure that I was still the one who was moving my arms and legs, even though I looked like this big, ugly, green monster in the mirror. “Okay, I have to change back to normal… I gotta relax… Just let go…”

I just closed my eyes and bowed my head down. Then I let my arms hang by my sides. I cleared my mind of everything as I tried not to think about anything. Then, I felt something that seemed like my body was returning to normal. My body began to shake a little bit, followed by a sweat. My heartbeat began to slow a bit, which was good. I was beginning to relax. Then, I was overcome by a slight, sinking feeling, which felt incredibly relaxing and soothing. It was as if I was shrinking a little bit. And, indeed: When I opened my eyes, I had shrunk back to normal and the green spots on my skin had faded! I was back to normal again! I figured I had found a way to return back to normal after I had grown into that big, tall, green, hulking figure!

I felt happy. This was big. No, it was huge. Because, my big worry now was… school.

What would happen to me if this green rash was to show up on my arm and I was at school? Part of me hoped I never had to find out! My next school day was only hours away!

And boy, was I right to worry about this. What would happen, if I were to exert myself at school? What if I was to find myself in the situation where I had to flex every muscle in my body, and I was to suddenly hulk out in the middle of class? What would I do? Where would I go? These things started to cross my mind as I woke up the following morning and I started to take my shower and got dressed. To be honest, I didn’t even want to think about it. I just had my bowl of cereal in the morning and I packed my bag as I walked to school, knowing that everything had changed for me from this moment forward. I would have to be super careful at school, or else I would morph into this big green giant, and I wouldn’t have any clue how to explain this to my classmates let alone the teachers at school.

No sooner had I arrived at the schoolyard or Jonathan, one of the geeky guys from math class, approached me. He always liked to talk to me about math and science, since he had heard stories about my grandpa from my mom, but this guy was a bit too geeky for me and I tried to keep my distance. Somehow, Jonathan always made an effort to look me up, even though I preferred to hang out with Jason and the other jocks who played tennis and soccer at school.

“Hey, Rex!” Jonathan said, as he walked next to me. “I was looking for a partner to work with me on the project for the science fair. Would you like to team up with me? I don’t have a partner yet!”

“Uhm… I was kinda thinking about teaming up with Jason, so let me think about it, okay?” I replied in a serious tone of voice.

“Well, we got another week or so to pick our partners, so don’t take too long!” he replied.

“I will let you know! But, keep on asking around in case you find someone else, alright?” I said to him. I didn’t want him to get his hopes up that I was going to be his partner so I kept the door open for him to ask other guys too.

As we walked through the main doors, Geoff, one of the guys on the basketball team, walked up to Jonathan.
1521122111.title: Back at school, that green rash begins to appea...

15211221111.content:
“Hey, John! You still got that Dollar you owe me?” the tall kid asked him.

“What Dollar? What are you talking about?”

“Listen here you dimwit! You owe me a Dollar for every Monday that we have class! That is money that ensures that you don’t get beaten up, remember?” the tall boy said to the geek, with an evil grin on his face.

“Well, I didn’t being any money today! So, leave me alone!”

I saw what was going on. Since Jonathan was short and very skinny with glasses and thin, blond hair, he was the prime victim of the big guys who were on the basketball team. He was their favorite target!

Geoff then walked up to Jonathan and ripped his backpack out of his hands! Then, he started opening the zippers as he began rummaging through his bag.

“I bet you must have some money in here…” the tall basketball player said, as he started pulling things out of the bag and throwing them on the ground.

“That’s my bag! Give it back!” Jonathan shouted, as he ran up to Geoff. But, since Geoff was so tall, he just raised the bag up higher, far out of the geeky boy’s reach!

“My bag! Give… me… my… bag!” Jonathan shouted as he started jumping up and down as he desperately tried to reach for his backpack.

“Give him back his bag, you big bully!” I shouted at the big buffoon.

“Mind your own business, Rex!” Geoff said, as he looked me straight in the eye. “Get lost!”

“That made me very angry. I set my own bag on the floor as I charged full speed at the big moron, slamming his big body up against the row of lockers! Due to the impact, he dropped the bag and I caught it with both hands.

“Give it back! NOW!” Geoff shouted, as he reached down with his long arms and grabbed hold of the bag.

I was holding on to the bag on one side as he was holding on from the other side. He began to pull the bag towards him, and I began to pull it towards me.

“AAAAARRRRRRRRR!!!!” I groaned as I pulled the bag towards me with every ounce of strength that I got, flexing every muscle in my body. And, as I looked down, I could see my fingers, my hands, and my arms turning lime green…

Several other students were surrounding us as my color started changing rapidly.

“Look at Rex! He’s turning GREEN!”

“What the heck is going on?”

“Hey! Rex’s muscles are getting bigger!”

“AAAAARRRRRRRRR-RRAAAAAAHHHHHH!!” I let out a mighty roar as I yanked the bag out of Geoff’s hands with incredible strength.

Then, I dropped the bag on the floor as I realized that I was green. All green! My muscles were big… Getting bigger… and growing!

“Oh no… No-no-no…. NO! ArrrrrRRRRAAARRR!!” I growled as I ran towards the boy’s bathroom while my body was still changing, which was incredibly difficult since every muscle in my body hurt like crazy! I broke out in a sweat and I was feeling incredibly hot as my pectorals ripped out of my t-shirt and my calves burst out of my jeans.

RRRRIIIPPPPPP!!!! CRAAACKKKKKK!!!!!!

I stood motionless in the deserted bathroom as I grew bigger and taller. My skin was completely green, and my feet had burst out of my sneakers and the bottom of my jeans had torn to shreds. I tore the remains of my t-shirt off and turned around, realizing that I had hulked out at school. This was a nightmare! How was I going to get out of here?

Then I heard the bathroom door open. It was Jonathan!

“Rex? Are you in here? Thanks for returning my… “

Then, Jonathan walked past the last stall and saw ME.

“WHHHAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!! A MONSTER!!! THERE IS A MONSTER IN THE BATHROOM!!!!”

“No! NOOO! Jonathan! It’s me! Rex! Ohhh NOO!!” I tried to say, but he went running out of the bathroom, screaming at the top of his lungs.

Some of the guys in the hallway didn’t believe him at first, of course.

“Look at Jonathan! What a sissy!”

“He is scared of everything!”

“What a wimp!”

Then I came out of the bathroom, in plain view of dozens of my classmates. Everyone gasped all at once, and then…. All hell broke loose!

“YYYEEEEEEEAAKKKKK!!!”

“A MONSTER!!!”

“RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!!!”

“I’M OUTTA HERE!”

“HE’S GONNA KILL US!”

“HE’LL EAT US ALIVE!!!”

One of the guys pulled the fire alarm, while made everybody else come out into the hallway and see me and freak out too!

“YYEAAAAAAAAAKKKK!!!!!”

This was bad. This was really, really, REALLY bad. I had to get out of here… NOW!

I turned around and ran towards the first emergency exit and I slammed against the huge steel doors until the burst open. Then, using my super-strong legs, I ran towards the fence and I leaped over the six-foot barrier until I landed all the way on the other side of the road. I then vaulted onto the rooftop of a warehouse until I raced to the park and got out of sight. From there, I leaped over thirty feet into the air, landing straight into our front yard!

I grabbed the handle of our front door and broke it, opening the door and slamming it behind me, practically smashing the door frame. As I turned around, I saw mom, looking at me with a surprised expression on her face. The TV in the living room was on, and she was watching a special report on the news.

“Rex? How was your morning? Let me guess… Are you responsible for this?” mom said, as she pointed to the TV set.

I sat down on the couch as I stared at the TV screen. I noticed that once I had allowed my body to relax completely, my muscles began to dwindle back to normal and my green skin color faded away.

I stared at the news broadcast showing my school! The lady, who was the announcer, was standing in front of the entrance to my school!

“The Superintendent of the Miami-Dade School District had just arrived at Hialeah Middle School in Northern Miami today to take control of a serious situation after a large man with green skin was last seen entering the school grounds. The security guards are placed on high alert today and all the teachers have placed the entire school on a complete lockdown since a strange muscular man, of about seven feet in height, wearing only torn jeans, was spotted in the boy’s bathroom. Nobody had seen the man walking in the building and the security guards have no idea how the man, who was reported having green skin, entered the building. It was also not clear how the man was able to scale the six-foot-tall fence, since there are no traces of the man having cut through the fence anywhere. The man appeared in the boy’s bathroom shortly after a scuffle had broken out between three students near the row of lockers, and the large, muscular man had just appeared out of nowhere! All the students have left the building by now after the man was spotted in the bathroom. Five police cars have arrived on the scene, and the Superintendent had decided to cancel all classes for the rest of the day. We will keep you posted as soon as more information becomes available!” the announcer spoke on the news broadcast.

I broke down in tears as mom sat down next to me.

“I… I d-didn’t do it on purpose, m-m-mom! I swear! They were picking on Jonathan and I tried to… I tried to help him out… Geoff had taken his bag and… I tried to get it back…” I sobbed. “I hulked out in the process of trying to get the bag back and now THIS happens!”

“It’s alright, Rex… You’ll have to learn to live with this thing…” mom said softly.

“How can I? I’m a big, green monster!”

Mom just stared at me with a smile on her face.

“Grandpa would have been so proud of you!”

“Well… Maybe… If grandpa were around… we could help each other out…” I replied.

“Grandpa is out there… Somewhere in the mountains of Brazil… I wish he could see you right now… See what you’re like when you’re big and green… Just like him…”

I looked at mom. Somehow, my sadness turned to joy. Someday, I would take that trip to Brazil and find grandpa and show him what I’m like. Maybe next summer. For now, I had to learn how to master the green monster thing and figure out how to survive the school year living with the possibility that I could become a green muscle giant again if I didn’t learn how to control this thing very soon!
15211221111.title: Rex helps a friend, and Hulks out at school!

152112211111.content:
The following day, I returned to school, feeling shaken. I became more shaken as i found a number of police officers and government type men in suits, questioning everyone. As I was about to head to my homeroom, a familiar voice reached my ears, causing a chill to run down my spine. "I told you to watch that temper of yours, kid." he said.

I spun around to find a man in his early thirties with brown hair and brown eyes, wearing a black business suit. "Who are you and what do you want from me?" I quietly demanded.

"Go home, Rex." said the man, ignoring my questions. "Learn to control your power and emotions, I'll call you when you can return to school."

"This is ridiculous!" I said, annoyed. "I'm going to class."

"Go home, you were lucky no one saw you change the last time but luck runs out eventually." said the man, more coldly. "I'm trying to save you from the nightmare your grandfather went through." he paused. "If you don't know what I'm talking about, ask your grandmother."

With that, the man casually walked away, down the hall as your gym coach, Mr. Watson came up to you. "Rex, what are you doing here?" he asked, surprised. "We were told you were injured by that monster that was in here yesterday."

"I... err.... was the first to see him in the bathroom." I said. "It turned to face me and accidentally caught me in the chest, knocking the wind out of me."

Watson winced. "Well, stay home for a few days and rest up." he said. "I'll have someone bring your homework to you."

With that, we walked away, leaving me with no choice but to return home...
152112211111.title: A mysterious man.

1521122111111.content:
When I came home that day, I picked up the phone and I called grandma.

At first she wasn’t home, so I decided to try an exercise of my own. I figured these muscles were still a part of me, so I just had to learn to control this thing on my own. I had to figure this out.

I walked to the bathroom and closed the door behind me so I could examine my reflection in the mirror. I removed my shorts and my t-shirt, leaving me standing there wearing just my underwear. Then, I just concentrated on becoming big again, by flexing every muscle in my body.

“Come on… I know you’re there! Come on!” I grunted as I flexed and concentrated even harder.

Then, after a minute or so, I saw my skin change color as the green hue returned. That was always the first sign that I was turning into that hulking figure again!

And indeed, I was able to stop flexing and let nature take its course. Once I turned green, there was no stopping it. My muscles just inflated on their own and grew bigger and bigger, tensing up automatically. I’ll be honest here, it felt great! It was an amazing feeling, just to feel every muscle in my body swell to insane proportions! My calves bulged to the size of melons while my quads grew bigger and wider at the same time, adding layer upon layer of bulging, green muscle to my legs. My biceps exploded like crazy, blowing up like never before, until they were round as cantaloupes and covered with thick veins. My pectorals shot out and forward from my chest, making my upper body bigger and wider at the same time. Gosh, every time I Hulked out, it seemed to get easier! This was almost getting too easy! On the other hand, I was amazed that it took me so little effort just to get the process started, which turned me into a Hulk-boy.
